text: Beginning with the Mont Pelerin Society , founded by the Austrian economist and philosopher Friedrich v. Hayek in 1947 , there arised first in England , then in other countries numerous institutions whose intention were to oppose the Keynesean after-war-consensus .

text: The Vienna Hayek Institute has set itself the task of supporting the worldwide renaissance of the Austrian School of National Economics and actively disseminating its ideas , especially those of its namesake , and preparing them for domestic decision-makers .
